Summarize the specified pull request in plain language. Read the PR title, description, all commits, and the list of changed files.

Produce:

  1. A two-sentence summary: what changed and why (draw from the description and commit messages)
  2. Scope: how many files changed, which areas of the repository were affected
  3. Risk level (High / Medium / Low) with one sentence of reasoning
  4. Any accessibility-relevant changes flagged (changes to headings, link text, alt text, ARIA, keyboard handlers)

Keep the summary under 150 words total. Write for someone who has not read the diff â€” they need to decide whether to review it or not.
